mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT reply_no , br.buss_no , reply_cntn , reply_dt , pubcyn , br.memb_id , reply_upno , reply_show , buss_nm , FIND_CODENM(pubcyn) AS pubcyn_nm , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY reply_dt) ROW_NUM FROM business_reply br JOIN business b ON(br.buss_no = b.buss_no) WHERE br.buss_no IN ( SELECT buss_no FROM business WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo} ) AND memb_id = #{membId} AND reply_show = '0N1' ORDER BY reply_dt ) T WHERE #{pageNum}*#{amount} >= ROW_NUM AND ROW_NUM > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}

SELECT level , reply_no , buss_no , reply_cntn , reply_dt , pubcyn , m.memb_id , reply_upno , m.memb_nm , reply_show FROM business_reply br LEFT JOIN member m ON(br.memb_id = m.memb_id) WHERE buss_no = #{bussNo} START WITH reply_upno IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR reply_no = reply_upno
